opendial.state.distribs

Class RuleDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • opendial.state.distribs.RuleDistribution
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ProbDistribution

    public class RuleDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
implements ProbDistribution
    Discrete probability distribution based on a rule specification (which can be for an update rule or a prediction rule).
    Version:
    $Date:: 2014-11-09 19:51:18 #$
    Author:
    Pierre Lison (plison@ifi.uio.no)
